flawed_nl_solution:
Peter has 19 - 7 = <<19-7=12>>12 years of experience.
Robert has 12 - 4 = <<12-4=7>>7 years of experience.
Mike has 7 - 2 = <<7-2=5>>5 years of experience.
Tom has 2 * 7 = <<2*7=14>>14 years of experience.
Roger has 12 + 7 + 5 + 14 = <<12+7+5+14=38>>38 years of experience.
Roger has to work another 50 - 38 = <<50-38=12>>12 years before he retires.
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
